mapper.select: select a.*, f_cdnm('PayTypeCode', pay01_pay_type_cd) pay01_pay_type_nm from pay01_payday a where pay01_payday_id != #{paydayId}

select a.*, f_cdnm('PayTypeCode', pay01_pay_type_cd) pay01_pay_type_nm from pay01_payday a where pay01_company_id = #{companyId} and pay01_pay_date < ( select pay01_pay_date from pay01_payday where pay01_payday_id = #{paydayId} and pay01_company_id = #{companyId} ) order by pay01_pay_date desc

select a.*, f_cdnm('PayTypeCode', pay01_pay_type_cd) pay01_pay_type_nm from pay01_payday a where pay01_company_id = #{companyId} and pay01_pay_date between to_date(#{payYear}||'.01.01','yyyy.mm.dd') and to_date(#{payYear}||'.12.31','yyyy.mm.dd') order by pay01_pay_date desc

select a.*, f_cdnm('PayTypeCode', pay01_pay_type_cd) pay01_pay_type_nm from pay01_payday a where pay01_company_id = #{companyId} and pay01_pay_type_cd = #{payTypeCode} and pay01_pay_date = ( select max(pay01_pay_date) from pay01_payday where pay01_company_id = a.pay01_company_id and pay01_pay_type_cd = a.pay01_pay_type_cd )
